name: MindManager Map Part File
summary: An MMMP file contains a map part created by Corel MindManager, a visual diagramming application used to organize ideas, plans, and projects. It stores part of a mind map diagram that users in other maps. MMMP files are similar to .MMAT template files, but they store one component of a map instead of the whole map.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MMMP file open in Corel MindManager 22
images.alt: MMMP file open in Corel MindManager 22
